duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item specific training.
Managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring, and performing post-project work and data analysis.
Applying science expertise throughout multiple parts of the item development and scoring process, including in meetings with clients and educators.
Communicating with various roles daily, including in-person and virtual interactions with customers and educators.
Mentoring and training Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, as well as training Science and potentially Math items to a large and varied scorer population.
Meeting customer’s requirements for quality of scoring, and directing the scoring team.
Managing multiple competing deadlines, overseeing logistics, communication, and training, among other responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
